plot: Two brothers, one an alcoholic and the other a minister, are reunited after the latter is shunned by his congregation for falling in love with a saloon keeper's daughter.
title: Volunteer Organist
plot_es: Two brothers, one an alcoholic and the other a minister, are reunited after the latter is shunned by his congregation for falling in love with a saloon keeper's daughter.
plot_en: Two brothers, one an alcoholic and the other a minister, are reunited after the latter is shunned by his congregation for falling in love with a saloon keeper's daughter.
